attributes.action: The UK government must stop Israel killing and shooting of unarmed protesters.
attributes.additional_details:
Because the UK government is responsible for creating the Apartheid state, they are also responsible for holding the Israeli Government to account for the systemic breaking of international law. This includes killing and injuring unarmed protesters, by their own, IDF officials', admission, injuring of natives and grotesque child arrests.
https://electronicintifada.net/blogs/ali-abunimah/israel-admits-then-deletes-responsibility-gaza-killings
attributes.background: 2018 has seen several unjustified and disproportionate violence against Palestinians. Friday 30th March alone evidenced the cruel planned execution of 16 unarmed protesters while the media wrongfully describe the situation as "clashes".  This impunity must stop.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask the UK Government to raise this issue with the Government of Israel.
